title: How do I set a song from Youtube Music as my ringtone on Google Pixel 3?
content: Can't seem to set a ringtone other than lame ones provided by Google.  Trying to set a song from Youtube Music as my ringtone on Google Pixel 3 which should be simple considering Youtube Music is a Google property, but it's not.  Tried saving the song to my Drive but that didn't work.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
